products.description: Full steam ahead! We discovered this art print featuring an illustration of a USA Twenty-Five Ton Passenger Engine from the 1850s at a vintage bookstore in NYC and carefully restored it to create this unique art print. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Full steam ahead! We discovered this art print featuring an illustration of a USA Taunton Locomotive from the 1850s at a vintage bookstore in NYC and carefully restored it to create this unique art print. Also available as part of our By Rail Gallery Wall set. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Perfect for budding little palaeontologists, our vintage-inspired Brachiosaurus Dinosaur art print is sure to make any child's bedroom wall look ROAR-some! Also available as part of our Vintage Dinosaurs Gallery Wall. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.
